The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer

The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer

The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
failed to submit draw command buffer
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286 ] Object 0: handle = 0x380000000038, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_SEMAPHORE; | MessageID = 0xe9e4b2a9 | vkAcquireNextImageKHR: Semaphore must not be currently signaled or in a wait state. The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m
[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071 ] Object 0: handle = 0x56366717eb78, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DEVICE; | MessageID = 0x2e2f4d65 | VkCommandBuffer 0x563667ff9418[] is already in use and is not marked for simultaneous use. The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m

[22;36mvalidation layer[0m: [22;33mValidation Error: [ VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296 ] Object 0: handle = 0x563667064428, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_QUEUE; | MessageID = 0xc7aabc16 | vkQueuePresentKHR(): pSwapchains[0] images passed to present must be in layout VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHARED_PRESENT_KHR but is in VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED. The Vulkan spec states: Each element of pImageIndices must be the index of a presentable image acquired from the swapchain specified by the corresponding element of the pSwapchains array, and the presented image subresource must be in the VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PRESENT_SRC_KHR layout at the time the operation is executed on a VkDevice (https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Docs/search?q=)VUID-VkPresentInfoKHR-pImageIndices-01296)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: If semaphore is not VK_NULL_HANDLE it must be unsignaled (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkAcquireNextImageKHR-semaphore-01286)[0m

The Vulkan spec states: If any element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits was not recorded with the VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT, it must not be in the pending state (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.2.162.0/linux/1.2-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkQueueSubmit-pCommandBuffers-00071)[0m
